channel.title: Speaking on Ravikanth Chaganti
channel.description: Recent content in Speaking on Ravikanth Chaganti

item.title: Speaking at Global Azure Bootcamp India 2021
item.description:
Global Azure Bootcamp is happening this year from April 15th to 17th as an online event. And, I will be speaking this year. I submitted a couple of sessions and the Azure Bicep session got accepted.

So, what is Azure Bicep?

Azure Bicep is the Domain-Specific Language (DSL) and a transparent abstraction built on top of Azure Resource Manager (ARM). The intention behind this project is to simplify authoring ARM templates. Bicep language transpiles into an ARM template JSON which you can deploy using already well-known methods and your existing CI/CD pipelines.

item.title: Azure Community Conference - 2020
item.description: Azure Community Conference is a 3 day multi-track virtual event scheduled to go live on November 24th 2020. This event is being organized by the Bangalore Azure User Group. The target audience of this virtual event are cloud and web developers working with open source and cloud native technologies on the Microsoft stack. This event will be a free two conference days that includes a free workshop as well. Registration for this event is open.
